column1: Suddenly browns spots appeared on my cheeks very dark, I tell one of friends,and she recommends to use Nunn care cream , I ordered and started feels the difference in 20 days , followed instructions , I used day and night just the cream, nothing else. All the dark spots gone in a month Now I only I used at night or day . Very happy with the product I really recommend.
I really like this product. We bought it in Mexico and when I found out Walmart has it too I got exited. Highly recommended it to clear your skin. It does take time but is worth it.
Love this cream it actually works, my husband had a brown smudge on his cheeks and they went away. I truly recommend this cream. Marianela A
Great cream I start seeing changes on my face in just two days I love it
Bought for my moms's sun spots and they're almost gone. She's tried a lot of creams and this one did it!
excellent product for your face, neck and hands, I can live without it!!!!!
Am happy with this cream is helping a lot with my acne
This vendor has been the worst by far! will not be ordering anymore from either vendor nor Walmart!
I got this item because it was recommended for my dark spots and freckles. It makes my face feel really soft and moisturized but I dont see a difference with my dark spots and freckles.
